boardgame.name: Viticulture
ワイナリーの四季
葡萄酒莊園
boardgame.description: In Viticulture, the players find themselves in the roles of people in rustic, pre-modern Tuscany who have inherited meager vineyards. They have a few plots of land, an old crushpad, a tiny cellar, and three workers. They each have a dream of being the first to call their winery a true success._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The players are in the position of determining how they want to allocate their workers throughout the year. Every season is different on a vineyard, so the workers have different tasks they can take care of in the summer and winter. There's competition over those tasks, and often the first worker to get to the job has an advantage over subsequent workers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fortunately for the players, people love to visit wineries, and it just so happens that many of those visitors are willing to help out around the vineyard when they visit as long as you assign a worker to take care of them. Their visits (in the form of cards) are brief but can be very helpful._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Using those workers and visitors, players can expand their vineyards by building structures, planting vines (vine cards), and filling wine orders (wine order cards). Players work towards the goal of running the most successful winery in Tuscany._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Carefully punched and played just once. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $12.35 for USPS with tracking (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). This is a copy of Viticulture First Edition with the Second Edition upgrade pack fully integrated. (All affected Visitor Cards from the First Edition have been replaced with their Second Edition versions. 6 Grande Workers are included as in the Second Edition. The large First Edition Grape Tokens have been replaced with smaller Second Edition Grape Tokens. Stickers have been applied to the boards to upgrade it to the Second Edition style) The rulebook is for the First Edition, but the Second Edition rulebook can be found in the files section. I have included a Rules Summary Sheet for the 2nd Edition. As a bonus, the original Arboriculture Expansion (boards / cards / tokens) are also included. All cards are sleeved. The box has virtually no shelf/edge wear. The components are all in great shape. The original insert IS included and it is very functional. The score sheet is NOT included as it has been used. Any questions just ask. :)
